Address.label: Address
Address.value: TWO LANDMARK SQUARE,SUITE 300, STAMFORD, Connecticut, 06901, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Lovesac Co designs, manufactures and sells alternative furniture which is comprised of modular couches called sactionals and premium foam beanbag chairs called sacs. It also offers other accessories such as blankets, footsacs, and throw pillows. Its products are sold across the United States through its website or company-owned retail stores which are used in homes and offices. Most of the firm's revenue gets derives from the sale of Sactionals.
